resources.string: Nagaon govt. boys high senior secondary school, Nagaon

Established in 1963 and spread over a sprawling 3.3 acres, Oil India Higher Secondary School, Duliajan significantly finds its role in preparing children for life and for global citizenship. Under the patronage of Oil India Limited which is a premier national Oil company and affiliated to Board of Secondary Education, Assam and Assam Higher Secondary Education Council, the school provides education to both boys and girls in three different mediums-English, Assamese and Hindi making it the pioneer of its kind. The school started its journey from a temporary building in Duliajan Club with a strength of 128 students and today it boasts of offering education to nearly 1200 students. The school is up to Higher Secondary level having four sections in each class from VI to X and one section each in Science and Arts at +2 level offering a good range of subject combinations. The school has a long record of brilliant results and can claim among its alumni many illustrious minds of India, particularly of Assam.The very first batch of the school in 1967 marked the beginning of a glorious legacy of significant achievements as Laxman Kanuga topped the rank holders in the Humanities group in the state and Saraju Prasad Tripathi stood fifth among the rank holders in the Science stream. The institution has also been served by several teachers of high repute. K B Kanuga , GM ,OIL , Chairman ,School Committee is seen delivering the address of welcome on the foundation stone laying ceremony of the school . Dev Kant Barooah , Education Minister , Assam and A.B.Dasgupta , the president of the Lions Club are also seen on the dais.

Supported and funded by: Dipika Laskar

Nagaon Govt Boys Higher Secondary School

Oil India Higher Secondary School, Duliajan was established in 1963. It is proud privilige for me to serve as a Principal of this esteemed institution. As Principal ,my goal is to inspire staff, parents and community to work together to provide education for all round development of students.I look forward to the opportunity to empower our students to reach a great success.It is a matter of pride for us that our staff have involved and successfully implemented a system for educational development of our school. Keeping this in mind, our school family continues to remain committed to achieve both our vision and mission. And I am sure the school will reach greater height in the years to comeWe believe ,our educational app will provide necessary learning materials to students in true manner
Our address:\nOil Town Duliajan, Duliajan No.1, Assam 786602
